sentences.en: A properly fitting bra should never leave red marks.
sentences.cn: 合适的胸罩不会留下红色勒痕。

sentences.en: After several starts, she read the report properly.
sentences.cn: 经过几次断续后，她开始顺利地念报告了。
正确的咀嚼方式是极其重要的。
糖尿病患者不能够正常代谢葡萄糖。

sentences.en: He had a split lip and an eye that wouldn't open properly.
sentences.cn: 他长着兔唇，一只眼睛无法正常睁开。

sentences.en: I had never really learnt to type properly.
sentences.cn: 我从来没真正学会怎样正确打字。

sentences.en: More than a quarter of seven year-olds cannot add up properly.
sentences.cn: 7岁的孩子中1/4以上都不会正确地做加法运算。

sentences.en: One in four pupils leaving secondary school can't read or write properly.
sentences.cn: 中学毕业生中有1/4的人读写有问题。

sentences.en: Parents should teach their children to behave properly in public.
sentences.cn: 家长应该教导子女在公共场合要有规有矩。

sentences.en: Some families don't have the resources to feed themselves properly.
sentences.cn: 有些家庭无力维持生活。

sentences.en: The application form is important. Sit down and write it out properly.
sentences.cn: 申请表十分重要，坐下来好好填写。

sentences.en: The bone hasn't knitted together properly.
The book is well written, properly illustrated and excellently captioned.
sentences.cn: 这本书写得很好，插图生动形象，说明文字简练精辟。

sentences.en: The brakes don’t seem to be working properly.
Then he’s not doing his job properly.
sentences.cn: 那么他没把分内事做好。

sentences.en: There needs to be a properly informed public debate.
sentences.cn: 有必要让公众在充分知情的状况下展开辩论。

sentences.en: When the rice isn't cooked properly it goes lumpy and gooey.
sentences.cn: 米饭没煮好会结块，而且软黏黏的。

words.tran_cn: 适当的；本身的；特有的；正派的

trans.tran_cn: 正确地，得体地，完全地，真正地
trans.tran_en: correctly, or in a way that is considered right
